EmailTemplate.subject: Sept. 20 Webinar Recording and CEU Links: Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet Billing Reports
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 20, 2011 Webinar: Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet-Billing Reports Thanks for Attending!
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=Sweet Billing User}} for joining us for our webinar on Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet-Billing Reports. We hope you found the information useful and would love to hear your ideas on other topics that you would be interested in hearing. Simply email cheri.lane@tritech.com with your ideas.
You can access the recording and handouts from the webinar using these links:
Recording Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/tztzspb
NAAC CEU Certificate Link: http://tritech.ilinc.com/content/tztzspb
Check out other educational webinars here: http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp
Thank you for your continued business! The TriTech Software Systems Team www.TriTechEMS.com
